summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AYA Regulars Manager dance community app. Backend APIs and core frontend features working correctly. Found JavaScript errors affecting some admin navigation but critical features functional.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript runtime errors showing 'destroy is not a function' - affects audit-log, notifications, and settings navigation

integration_issues.issue: Dark mode toggle button not found in instructor interface

passed_tests: Dashboard stats cards display (Active Batches: 1, Total Dancers: 5, etc.)
Admin sidebar navigation to Batches, Dancers, Instructors pages
Batches page shows 'Open-Style Batch' card with dancer count and instructor info
Dancers page shows 5 seeded dancers with pass status badges
Batch view navigation with Today/Dancers/History tabs
Today tab shows enrolled dancers with big circular attendance toggle buttons
Save attendance with summary dialog showing warnings
Pass status badges (Active monthly, Active class pack, Expiring, Expired)
Mobile-first responsive design with monochrome black/white UI
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix JavaScript 'destroy is not a function' errors affecting admin navigation items (audit-log, notifications, settings). Add dark mode toggle to instructor interface to match admin interface.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Core features working, minor navigation issues in admin panel
